SAVE AS 1 SPECIFIED*ATOM 1 
SO_COUNT = 0 
BEGIN BLK_SOCHK 
FOR EACH OXYGEN ATOM ALPHA TO SAVED*ATOM 1 DO DB_CHK 
IF THERE IS A DOUBLE*BOND SPANNING SAVED*ATOM 1 AND  & 
SPECIFIED*ATOM 1 THEN SO_COUNT = SO_COUNT + 1 
DB_CHK ENDDO 
BLKEND BLK_SOCHK 
IF THERE IS A CHLORINE ATOM ALPHA TO SAVED*ATOM 1 AND:IF  & 
(SO_COUNT .GE. ONE) THEN KILL

0.note:
FOR EACH IODINE ATOM ANYWHERE DO I_CHK 
IF THERE IS ONLY ONE ATOM ALPHA TO SPECIFIED*ATOM 1 AND:IF  & 
THERE IS AN AROMATIC ATOM ALPHA TO SPECIFIED*ATOM 1 THEN KILL

1.note: KILL IF THERE IS A HETERO ATOM WITHIN BETA TO ATOM*2 OFFPATH

2.note: KILL IF THERE IS A HETERO ATOM WITHIN BETA TO ATOM*2 OFFPATH

3.note:
FOR EACH SULFUR ATOM ANYWHERE DO SN_CHK 
SAVE AS 1 SPECIFIED*ATOM 1 
SO_COUNT = 0 
BEGIN BLK_SOCHK 
FOR EACH OXYGEN ATOM ALPHA TO SAVED*ATOM 1 DO DB_CHK 
IF THERE IS A DOUBLE*BOND SPANNING SAVED*ATOM 1 AND  & 
SPECIFIED*ATOM 1 THEN SO_COUNT = SO_COUNT + 1 
DB_CHK ENDDO 
BLKEND BLK_SOCHK 
IF THERE IS A CHLORINE ATOM ALPHA TO SAVED*ATOM 1 AND:IF  & 
(SO_COUNT .GE. ONE) THEN KILL

0.note: KILL IF THERE IS AN ATOM ALPHA TO ATOM*1 OFFPATH  & OR: ALPHA TO ATOM*3 OFFPATH

1.note: KILL IF THERE IS AN ATOM ALPHA TO ATOM*1 OFFPATH  & OR: ALPHA TO ATOM*3 OFFPATH

2.note: KILL IF THERE IS A NITRO GROUP WITHIN BETA TO ATOM*2 OFFPATH

3.note: KILL IF THERE IS A NITRO GROUP WITHIN BETA TO ATOM*2 OFFPATH

4.note: KILL IF ANYWHERE OFFPATH THERE IS A CARBONYL GROUP OR: CARBOXYL GROUP

5.note:
KILL IF THERE IS NOT A CARBON ATOM ALPHA TO ATOM*2 OFFPATH AND:IF  & 
THERE IS A GOOD*LEAVING GROUP ANYWHERE OFFPATH

6.note: KILL IF ANYWHERE THERE IS AN ALCOHOL OR: HYDROXYLAMINE

7.note:
KILL IF ANYWHERE OFFPATH THERE IS AN AMINE*1 OR AZIRIDINE OR: EPISULFIDE OR:  & 
PHOSPHONATE OR: EPOXIDE OR: O*SULPHONATE

8.note: KILL IF THERE IS AN AMINE GROUP ON ATOM*5 OR: ATOM*6 OR: ATOM*7 OR: ATOM*8

9.note:
IF THERE IS A CARBON ATOM ALPHA TO ATOM*2 OFFPATH 
BEGIN HAL*INCR 
SAVE IT AS 1 
FOR EACH HALOGEN ATOM ANYWHERE DO LOC_CHK 
SAVE AS 2 THE ATOM ALPHA TO SPECIFIED*ATOM 1 
KILL IF SAVED*ATOM 2 IS NOT THE SAME AS SAVED*ATOM 1

0.note: KILL IF THERE IS NOT A CARBON ATOM ALPHA TO ATOM*1 OFFPATH

1.note:
IF THERE IS A HETERO ATOM ALPHA TO SAVED*ATOM 1 OFFPATH 
BEGIN BLK_HETCHK 
KILL IF SAVED*ATOM 1 IS NOT AROMATIC

0.note: KILL IF THERE IS AN ATOM ALPHA TO ATOM*3 OFFPATH

1.note: KILL IF ANYWHERE OFFPATH THERE IS A CARBONYL GROUP

2.note: KILL IF THERE IS A GOOD*LEAVING GROUP ANYWHERE OFFPATH

3.note: KILL IF THERE IS AN AMINE*1 GROUP ON ATOM*5 OR: ATOM*6 OR: ATOM*7 OR: ATOM*8

4.note: KILL IF THERE IS AN AMINE*1 GROUP ANYWHERE OFFPATH

5.note: KILL IF THERE IS AN AMINE*2 GROUP ON ATOM*5 OR: ATOM*8

0.note: KILL IF ANYWHERE OFFPATH THERE IS A CARBONYL GROUP

1.note: KILL IF THERE IS A GOOD*LEAVING GROUP ANYWHERE OFFPATH

2.note: KILL IF THERE IS AN AMINE*1 GROUP ON ATOM*5 OR: ATOM*6 OR: ATOM*7 OR: ATOM*8

3.note: KILL IF THERE IS AN AMINE*1 GROUP ANYWHERE OFFPATH

4.note: KILL IF THERE IS AN AMINE*2 GROUP ON ATOM*5 OR: ATOM*8

0.note: KILL IF ANYWHERE THERE IS AN AMINE*1 OR: AMINE*2 OR: C*SULFONATE

1.note:
FOR EACH CARBON ATOM ALPHA TO ATOM*1 OFFPATH DO AMIDCHK
 KILL IF THERE IS AN OXYGEN ATOM ALPHA TO SPECIFIED*ATOM 1

0.note: IF ATOM*6 AND ATOM*7 ARE NOT IN A COMMON RING THEN KILL

1.note: IF ATOM*6 IS MULTIPLY BONDED OR:IF ATOM*7 IS MULTIPLY BONDED THEN KILL

2.note: IF THERE IS AN ETHER ANYWHERE THEN KILL

3.note:
FOR EACH SULFUR ATOM OFFPATH DO THIOAM
 SAVE AS 1 SPECIFIED*ATOM 1
 IF THERE IS A NITROGEN ATOM ALPHA TO SAVED*ATOM 1
 BEGIN O_CHK
 FOR EACH OXYGEN ATOM ALPHA TO SAVED*ATOM 1 DO BND_CHK
 IF THE BOND SPANNING SPECIFIED*ATOM 1 AND  &
 SAVED*ATOM 1 IS A DOUBLE*BOND THEN KILL

0.note:
KILL IF ANYWHERE OFFPATH THERE IS AN ALCOHOL OR: AMINE*1  &
 OR: AMINE*2 OR: AMIDE*1 OR: OXIME OR: THIOL OR: ACID  & 
OR: ACID*HALIDE

KILL IF ANYWHERE OFFPATH THERE IS AN ALDEHYDE OR: KETONE
KILL IF ANYWHERE OFFPATH THERE IS AN IODIDE OR: BROMIDE

1.note: KILL IF THERE IS A MULTIPLE BOND ON ATOM*1 OFFPATH

2.note: KILL IF THERE IS A SILICON ATOM ALPHA TO ATOM*1

3.note: KILL IF THERE IS A NONEXPANDABLE*WITHDRAWING GROUP ON ALPHA TO ATOM*1

4.note: KILL IF THERE IS A MULTIPLE BOND ON ATOM*2 OFFPATH

5.note: KILL IF THERE IS AN ESTER GROUP ON ALPHA TO ATOM*1 OFFPATH

6.note:
FOR EACH ENOLIZABLE SAVED*ATOM 1 DO ENOLCHK
THERE ARE WITHDRAWING BONDS ON SPECIFIED*ATOM 1
IF ANY PREVIOUS BOND LOCANT IS THE SAME AS
ANY BOND NOT*ON ATOM*2 THEN KILL

8.note:
FOR EACH LEAVING GROUP ON ALPHA TO ATOM*1 OFFPATH DO LEAVCHK
IF SPECIFIED*ATOM 1 HAS NO AMIDZ AND:IF SPECIFIED*ATOM 1
 IS NOT MULTIPLY BONDED THEN KILL

0.note: KILL IF THERE IS A MULTIPLE BOND ON ATOM*3

1.note: KILL IF THERE IS A SILICON ATOM ALPHA TO ATOM*3

2.note: KILL IF THERE IS A NONEXPANDABLE*WITHDRAWING GROUP ON ALPHA TO ATOM*2

3.note:
SAVE AS 1 ALPHA TO ATOM*3 OFFPATH
FOR EACH ENOLIZABLE SAVED*ATOM 1 DO ENOLCHK
THERE ARE WITHDRAWING BONDS ON SPECIFIED*ATOM 1
IF ANY PREVIOUS BOND LOCANT IS THE SAME AS  &
ANY BOND NOT*ON ATOM*3 THEN KILL

4.note:
SAVE AS 1 ALPHA TO ATOM*3 OFFPATH
FOR EACH ENOLIZABLE SAVED*ATOM 1 DO ENOLCHK
THERE ARE WITHDRAWING BONDS ON SPECIFIED*ATOM 1
IF ANY PREVIOUS BOND LOCANT IS THE SAME AS  &
ANY BOND NOT*ON ATOM*3 THEN KILL

5.note:
FOR EACH LEAVING GROUP ON ALPHA TO ATOM*3 OFFPATH DO LEAVCHK
IF SPECIFIED*ATOM 1 HAS NO AMIDZ AND:IF SPECIFIED*ATOM 1  &
IS NOT MULTIPLY BONDED THEN KILL

6.note:
IF THERE IS A HALOGEN*ATOM ALPHA TO SAVED*ATOM 1 AND:IF  &
THERE IS A HYDROGEN ON SAVED*ATOM 1 THEN KILL

7.note:
IF THERE IS A NITRILE ON ALPHA TO ATOM*3 OFFPATH
BEGIN CN_CHK
KILL IF THERE ARE TWO HYDROGENS ON ATOM*3

8.note:
IF THERE IS A HETERO ATOM ALPHA TO ATOM*3
BEGIN WG_CHK
KILL IF THERE IS NOT A CARBON ATOM ALPHA TO ATOM*3 OFFPATH
